summary: I wasn't able to take a picture until the next day.
Have owned this camera for a few years.
I got this camera a couple of months ago and I'm not real please with it.
The camera has a good zoom on it, and is very easy to use.
If you need small cameras, you have to typically settle for picture quality that LOOKS like it came from a tourist gadget.Not this one!
It has been very easy to do so with the bundled Nero software.
This is a pretty nice drive for the price and if you have other applications it should work just fine.
It's not exactly what I wanted.
My advice is to buy Memorex but never bother with the installation of Nero.
I haven't tried to burn a DVD yet, so we'll see what happens.
This speaker sounds great and it doesn't disappear behind the rest of my home theater.
I replaced my old center channel speaker with this one and am amazed at the quality of the sound.
For me, this is the perfect center channel speaker.
It has a good sound that I think the average person will be more than pleased with.
I've been saving up for new stuff and the center speaker was the last thing to buy.
